title: Fox News Fighting Itself, Le KFC 3.17.22

description:
In episode 1206, Jack and Miles are joined by writer and podcaster Sarah Marshall to discuss The Kremlin Talking Points continue to cause problems on Fox, KFC Is Going Full Demolition Man and more!

  1. The Kremlin Talking Points continue to cause problems on Fox
  2. Why John Mearsheimer Blames the U.S. for the Crisis in Ukraine
  3. KFC Is Going Full Demolition Man
  4. Kentucky Fried Chicken Degustation Reservations
